backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the e-commerce backend with data types and state for products, orders, messages, shopping carts, reviews, notifications, analytics, and discussion posts, mixing in authorization and blob storage functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping the Internet Identity principal display feature to its implementing files (Header.tsx and PrincipalDisplay.tsx) with associated components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing the purpose and key details of every component, page, and configuration file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, primary, sidebar, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Mosslight Studios app that mounts the React application into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes (storefront, admin, forum, etc.) and wraps the app with ThemeProvider, AdminAuthProvider, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Full-page access denied UI component showing a shield alert icon, an explanatory message, and a button to navigate back to the home page.
Cart button component that handles quantity input and variant selection validation before calling the addItemToCart mutation, showing appropriate error toasts for inventory or selection issues.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard component that renders children only when the admin is authenticated via useAdminAuth, otherwise displaying the AccessDeniedScreen.
Modal dialog component for admin authentication that accepts an 8-digit passcode, calls the login hook, and navigates to the admin dashboard on success.
frontend/src/components/AdminNotificatio: Displays unread admin and low-inventory notifications in a card panel, with a button to mark each notification as read.
frontend/src/components/AdminReplyForm.t: Form component visible only to admin users that allows posting a reply to a specific discussion board post.
Form for authenticated users to submit a new question to the discussion board, with loading and auth-state feedback.
frontend/src/components/CustomerMessages: Renders a list of messages sent to a customer from Mosslight Studios, labeling broadcast messages with an 'Announcement' badge.
frontend/src/components/DiscussionPostLi: Displays a sorted list of discussion posts as clickable cards showing question, status badge, timestamp, and reply count.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer component showing social media links, copyright year, and a 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution link.
frontend/src/components/GalleryItem.tsx: Renders a single gallery card with optional media image, content text, and records a content-view analytics event on mount.
frontend/src/components/GalleryUploadFor: Admin form for uploading gallery content with optional media files, showing upload progress and calling the addSocialMediaContent mutation on submit.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky site header with navigation links, cart icon with item count, notification bell, admin login modal, and Internet Identity login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps all pages with a shared Header, Footer, and a main content area rendered via React Router's Outlet.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, showing a loading spinner during authentication.
Admin form card for composing and sending broadcast messages to all customers, with recipient type selection and submission state handling.
frontend/src/components/MessageHistory.t: Displays a list of previously sent admin messages as cards, showing timestamp, broadcast/direct badge, content, and optional recipient.
frontend/src/components/MyOrderCard.tsx: Card component showing a single customer order with line items, variant details, per-item pricing, and a total, alongside an order status badge.
frontend/src/components/NotificationBell: Dropdown notification bell that fetches unread notifications and allows marking them as read, with icons differentiated by notification type.
frontend/src/components/OrderList.tsx: Admin order list with search filtering by order ID or customer, and an inline status selector to update each order's status.
frontend/src/components/OrderStatusBadge: Small badge component that maps an OrderStatus value (pending, shipped, delivered) to a styled Badge variant and label.
Badge component that renders a forum post's status (open or answered) with color-coded styles.
frontend/src/components/PrincipalDisplay: Displays the authenticated user's Internet Identity principal in a banner with a copy-to-clipboard button and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Renders a product card with image, name, price, stock badge, and star ratings, linking to the product detail page and recording analytics on click.
frontend/src/components/ProductForm.tsx: Form component for creating or editing a product, handling image uploads, variants, and connection/auth validation before submitting to the backend.
frontend/src/components/ProductReviews.t: Displays a list of product reviews with star ratings, verified purchase badges, and timestamps, sorted by newest first.
frontend/src/components/ProductSearch.ts: Provides search and price-range filter controls that reactively filter a products list and notify the parent via a callback.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that collects name, email, and shipping address from a new user and saves their profile, blocking dismissal until submission.
frontend/src/components/ReplyList.tsx: Renders a chronologically sorted list of admin replies, each displayed in a styled card with an Admin badge and formatted timestamp.
frontend/src/components/ReviewForm.tsx: Form for authenticated users to submit a star rating and text review for a product, with validation and error handling for non-purchasers.
frontend/src/components/SocialMediaLinks: Renders a row of social media icon links (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok) for Moss Light Studios with hover styling.
frontend/src/components/VariantManager.t: UI component for managing product variants (size, color, price, inventory) with add, edit, and remove functionality including field validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.tsx: React context provider and hook for admin authentication using a hardcoded passcode with 24-hour session persistence in localStorage and backend initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnalytics.ts: Hooks for fetching aggregated analytics data (clicks, views, revenue, orders) and recording analytics events via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Hooks for cart operations (view, add item, clear, checkout) that call the backend actor and invalidate relevant React Query caches on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerMessages.t: Hook to fetch the current customer's messages from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerOrders.ts: Hooks to fetch the current customer's order list or a single order by ID from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useDiscussionBoard.ts: Hooks for reading and writing discussion board posts and replies, with React Query cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useGallery.ts: Hooks for fetching social media gallery content and a stub mutation for uploading content (not yet implemented in the backend).
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom Internet Identity authentication hook and provider that wraps DFINITY's AuthClient to manage login, logout, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: Hooks for fetching all messages (admin) and sending a message to a recipient via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Hooks for fetching unread notifications and marking a notification as read via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Hooks for fetching all orders (admin) and updating an order's status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching, adding, updating, and deleting products via the backend actor, with permission and auth error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductVariants.ts: Provides a React Query hook to fetch product variants for a given product ID via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useReviews.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch product reviews with average rating and submit new reviews via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides React Query hooks to get and save the caller's user profile and retrieve their user role from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines Mosslight Studios brand color tokens for light and dark modes, along with base font styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page displaying Mosslight Studios' story, mission, and contact/social media links.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAnalyticsPage.ts: Admin analytics dashboard page showing revenue, order count, product clicks, content views, and low inventory alerts using data from the analytics hook.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard landing page displaying navigation cards for all admin sections including products, orders, messaging, gallery, forum, and analytics.
frontend/src/pages/AdminGalleryPage.tsx: Admin gallery management page that renders the GalleryUploadForm component within an AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMessagesPage.tsx: Admin-only page for composing and viewing message history sent to customers, using tabs to switch between the MessageComposer and MessageHistory components.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrdersPage.tsx: Admin-only page that fetches and displays all customer orders in an OrderList component with a loading spinner while data is fetched.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProductsPage.tsx: Admin-only page for managing the product catalog, supporting add, edit, and delete operations with a product grid view and an inline ProductForm.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page that displays cart items with product/variant details, calculates totals, and provides options to clear the cart or proceed to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page for authenticated users that displays pre-filled shipping info from the user profile and accepts a demo payment method to place an order.
frontend/src/pages/FAQPage.tsx: Static FAQ page organized into categories (Shipping, Returns, Product Care, Ordering) rendered as collapsible accordion sections.
frontend/src/pages/ForumPage.tsx: Discussion board page that lists existing posts and provides an AskQuestionForm for users to submit new questions.
frontend/src/pages/ForumThreadPage.tsx: Individual forum thread page that displays a discussion post, its replies, and an AdminReplyForm for admins to respond.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a gallery page that fetches and renders social media content items in a grid, with a loading spinner and social media follow links.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the Mosslight Studios home page with a hero section, a three-feature highlights section, and a call-to-action section linking to products and gallery.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Shows an authenticated user's account page with tabbed views for their orders and messages, redirecting unauthenticated users and prompting profile setup if needed.
frontend/src/pages/OrderSuccessPage.tsx: Displays an order confirmation screen with a success icon and optional order ID, offering navigation to orders or the products page.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Renders a product detail page with variant selection (size/color), dynamic pricing, inventory status, add-to-cart functionality, and a reviews section.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Lists all products in a responsive grid with search/filter support, showing result counts and empty-state messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom color palette (oklch variables, emerald, nude), typography/container-queries/animate plugins, and custom fonts, shadows, and accordion keyframes.
project_state.json: Tracks the current state of an ICP-based art portfolio and merchandise store project, listing existing features, pending feature requests (portfolio, store, Stripe, blog, polls, admin panel), and known issues around hardcoding the admin principal.
